moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Let’s Keep Cool!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Def and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.

passives.name: Tighten Up 2
passives.description: Has a moderate chance of raising the user’s Sp. Def when the user is hit by an attack move.
